inflate().Description: Inflate the appropriate child layout for the last known container.

onLayout(boolean, int, int, int, int).FullName: void onLayout (boolean changed, int left, int top, int right, int bottom)

Parameters: int: Resource id of a child layout to inflate
setRoundLayout(int).Description: Set a layout resource to be inflated when this stub is within a round container.

Parameters: int: Resource id of a child layout to inflate
setRectLayout(int).Description: Set a layout resource to be inflated when this stub is within a rectangular container.

ClassDesc: starting with API 23 the sdk supports "round" and "notround" configuration qualifiers which are preferred. For more information about configuration qualifiers, see A WatchViewStub allows for the use of different sub-layouts depending on the shape of the device screen as reported by http:##developer#android#com@B_android#view#View#onApplyWindowInsets_E@. If the call is not delivered by initial measurement the container will be assumed rectangular.
